scripts.build: npm run tstl-build && npm run nested-lib && npm run lib && npm run bundle
scripts.setup: npm run install-tstl && npm run install-plugin && npm run install-library && npm run install-bundle
scripts.install-library: cd ./library && npm i && npm link && npm link file:../TypeScriptToLua
scripts.install-nested-library: cd ./library && npm i && npm link && npm link file:../TypeScriptToLua
scripts.install-plugin: cd ./TstlModuleResolutionPlugin && npm i && npm link file:../TypeScriptToLua
scripts.cleanup: npm run cleanup-nested-lib && npm run cleanup-library && npm run cleanup-plugin && npm run cleanup-tstl
